entry.title: We Read to Know We Are Not Alone
entry.summary:
Author: BekahRose

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,754Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: “Will you read to me?” Big eyes peer at Buck from behind his glasses.“Uhh…” Buck’s eyes widen comically, and Eddie has to bite his lip to keep from laughing. “I’m not… I don’t think…” He casts a frantic look at Eddie, like he’s just been asked to pull yet another live round out of the leg of someone else, only this time he has to do it on his own.Eddie can’t help it; he does laugh this time. “I thought you loved kids?” he teases, throwing Buck’s own words back at him. Words he has held onto and kept tucked away behind his ribs for the better part of the last twelve months.“What?” Buck’s brow furrows and Eddie blinks slowly and shakes his head.“It’s just a book, Buck. Relax.”  ORFour times Buck reads to Christopher, and one time he knowingly reads to Eddie.

entry.title: the program
entry.summary:
Author: deancasandthemoose

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,735Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 428

Summary: Buck works as a support submissive, a re-entry resource for dominants who get released from prison. Support subs live with their dominants and cook and clean and generally service their dominants to help them re-acclimate to society.Buck is good at his job, so he usually gets assigned to higher risk cases. He’s had absolutely no problem staying professional.He’s sure that Eddie Diaz, convicted murderer, is going to be absolutely no different.

entry.title: I Didn’t Mean to Be Something I’m Not Supposed To, but I Am. I Am.
entry.summary:
Author: schrijverr

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 94,853Chapters: 23/23Kudos: 492

Summary: After everything Buck and Eddie have gone through together, the marriage that was once just convenience is now real. They’re boyfriend-husbands, trying to figure out what their life looks like now that they’re dating and learning to be an actual couple.However, trouble arises with the promised trip back home to El Paso for the summer. Eddie is not ready to come out to his parents and Buck supports him in that. Still, El Paso is not the place where either of them have been their best and tensions arise between them when having to exist in the influence sphere of the Diaz parents. Everything that has happened between them catches up as personal histories, insecurities and unresolved issues float back up to the surface. AKA: The terrible, horrible, no good, very bad El Paso trip where Buck and Eddie's marriage of convenience has become a secret relationship instead.

entry.title: You are drifting away (and I'm lost in the waves)
entry.summary:
Author: Sunset_mayBe

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,133Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 2

Summary: They don’t share kisses (yet), but they do share morning coffee and movie nights, they share a kind of domesticity that Buck has only read in romantic novels and dreamed about it. They share a house, a room, a son. They share quiet smiles and side hugs, they share a work, pillows and secrets. They are just a step away from make it official, just step away from let it happen. Buck is excited for his future for the first time, he can’t wait to taste happiness this way. Except, everything comes crashing down one afternoon at Bobby’s house, when Eddie says he has a date the next day.Buck needs to find himself again, he needs to find his happiness. He can't depend on Eddie, he can't just keep waiting for his dreams to come true. He needs to pull himself together to support and help Eddie, to be the best friend he deserves but without losing himself in the way.

entry.title: stay alive, open wide
entry.summary:
Author: dogfishmonger

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 280,150Chapters: 28/40Kudos: 779

Summary: He feels like shit when he's hungry, and he plays better when he's empty. The cold air doesn't touch him as much. The floodlights turn silvery-soft.And he likes eating. Keeps his hands busy, mouth busy, mind busy. Something to chew through, putty in the ears.Go until he can't anymore. Cycle it back out. Be ready. --OR: Buck's had on-again, off-again bulimia since he was 14.--Updates on Wednesdays. Title from Psychic Friend's "We Do Not Belong".

entry.title: The Cost Of Loving You
entry.summary:
Author: Iceprincess96

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,080Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 12

Summary: Eddie thought that when he finally confessed his love to Buck, he had found his happy ending. But the universe seemed intent on testing him. Three months into their relationship, Buck breaks up with him over pancakes, leaving Eddie shattered. As Buck moves on and starts seeing someone new, Eddie spirals, hiding his heartbreak behind a fragile mask of friendship. When the weight of unspoken feelings finally cracks, both men are forced to confront the love, fear, and mistakes that kept them apart.With the 118 as witnesses, and Chris as the heart between them, Eddie and Buck must navigate heartbreak, trust, and the slow, painful road to redemption — discovering that love can survive even when it’s broken. Previous Title - Shattered and whole

entry.title: At Immortality's Behest (can you stay a little longer?)
entry.summary:
Author: CavalieriNocturne

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,065Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 117

Summary: Magnus Bane is in pain, to say the least. His powers are gone, his position as High Warlock given to a person he despises, and the love of his immortal life leaving him to his own devices. As he is about to remove his memories about his beloved Alexander Lightwood, Magnus is stopped by Asmodeus.This follows S3 E19 to the point of the conversation between Magnus and Asmodeus, but not how it Ended.What if instead of going with his Father, Magnus defeats Asmodeus in his apartment, gets his powers back, then flees to Los Angeles? What if he changes his identity, becomes Dr. Benson "Blue" Kwan, and meets people from the 118?Living with mundanes, saving lives rather than taking them, saving people with knowledge instead of magic—will his past haunt him in Los Angeles? will he continue to be at immortality's behest ?

entry.title: 118 Valley
entry.summary:
Author: OptionUnavailable

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,650Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 9

Summary: As a kid, Buck loved to spend the summers on his grandpa's farm in Pelican Town. His parents would send him there so they didn't have to deal with him, but Buck didn't mind, neither did Grandpa. He would spend the mornings helping Grandpa with chores and afternoons playing with the neighborhood kids. Fresh air, no-judgement town, and his grandpa paid more attention to him than his parents! This was the life!But what would happen if Buck's parents thought that he was getting too comfortable there? That Grandpa was putting too many thoughts in his head about how he can be "anything"? What would happen if Buck wasn't allowed to return to his friends and his second life inside the valley?

entry.title: To the Ends of the Earth (would you follow me?)
entry.summary:
Author: ChasetheWindTouchtheSky

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,384Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 10

Summary: As a brother left over, there are two routes a life can go.Surrounded by love, care, and the protection of parents who know how painful the loss of a child is, the brother can flourish, becoming a beacon in a family who will always have someone missing. The space will never be filled, but it grows smaller with the laugh of the brother that still exists, with the memories held closely by those who loved him the most.Or, the brother leaves and becomes a ghost.A ghost that haunts the living until the brother left over transforms into something transparent himself. The outline of who he once was becomes nothing at all, leaving the brother left over questioning if this is the person he was always meant to be or—He’s simply a shadow, never meant to be real.***After a call where an older brother dies protecting his two siblings rattles Buck into some old habits, he can't help but question his place everyone's life. When LA is hit with wildfires and the 118 is called to the front lines, he and Chimney are put in a precarious position that raises the question: what is a brother and what is sacrifice? Or, the Brother Fic.

entry.title: Aap Jaisa Koi

entry.title: Between his hands - Part. 6 - Submission
entry.summary:
Author: 911_by_Jane

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,714Chapters: 3/5Kudos: 31

Summary: Where secrets, fears, and unexpected desires shatter the delicate balance of their relationship.After the ordeals that nearly cost him his life, Buck has managed to rebuild himself. His body has healed, his certification is validated, and Eddie's love has given him the strength to get back on his feet. But a persistent pain forces him to seek a medical opinion, and the ensuing revelations shake his entire world.Buck finds himself facing a choice that confronts his deepest fears. He believes he must give up his old life, Eddie's love, everything he has built. But Eddie, more determined than ever, won't let him go. He wants the world with him, and he is ready to do anything to convince him that their future has just begun.Will Buck be able to accept being loved for who he is, and embrace this new, unexpected life, filled with doubts, joy, and fears?I'm not very good to English, so please forgive any mistakes I didn't spot (there may be a lot.)

entry.title: Superwoman: Last Responder
entry.summary:
Author: That_bitch_without_a_life

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,685Chapters: 9/10Kudos: 51

Summary: If anybody were to ask Kara why she chose to be a firefighter she’d tell you that she loves helping humanity and wants to give back to a community who gave so much to her when they so graciously took her in. If Kal El of Krypton asked Kara the same question she’d would’ve already thrown him into the sun, since it was his dumb idea to get her out into the ‘real world’.While there’s truth to the fact she wants to help, there’s nothing humanity has ever given her that she thinks she should pay them back for. Maybe she would help the Themyscirans for their training, however, she was already sufficient back on Krypton having been part of the army for years. But no, the reason Kara choose to be a firefighter was because it was a high energy job on a planet where she annoyingly couldn’t get drunk off her ass and thus needed something to keep her occupied.TLDR: this is a female buck fic if she was supergirl, just trust the process.
